EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This card will #yExhaust if it is in your hand at the end of the turn a certain number of times.

${modID}:Research.NAME: Research
${modID}:Research.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL Gain !M! Strength or !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:Development.NAME: Development
${modID}:Development.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Play 1 Skill: Upgrade !M! random card in your draw pile.
${modID}:Development.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Play 1 Skill: Upgrade !M! random cards in your draw pile.

${modID}:OpeningStatement.NAME: Opening Statement
${modID}:OpeningStatement.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. When ${modID}:Phasing, add a copy without ${modID}:Phase into your discard pile.

${modID}:GravityParry.NAME: Gravity Parry
${modID}:GravityParry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When ${modID}:Phasing, deal !${modID}:damageplus! more damage and gain !${modID}:blockplus! more Block.

${modID}:Assist.NAME: Assist
${modID}:Assist.DESCRIPTION: If the next card you play is an Attack, gain !B! Block and draw a card.

${modID}:O5Command.NAME: O5 Command
${modID}:O5Command.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add ${modID}:Phase and Ethereal to all cards in your hand. You cannot draw cards next turn.

${modID}:Uplink.NAME: Uplink
${modID}:Uplink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the next card you play has ${modID}:Phase, Exhaust a copy of it.

${modID}:RSquare.NAME: R-Square
${modID}:RSquare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increases by 2 for every ${modID}:Trial on your active ${modID}:Experiments.

${modID}:RagingBlade.NAME: Raging Blade
${modID}:RagingBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !${modID}:Subdamage! damage to ALL other enemies. NL Add a *Burn to your hand.

${modID}:ShelvedProject.NAME: Shelved Project
${modID}:ShelvedProject.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - End Turn: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ConcealedCarry.NAME: Concealed Carry
${modID}:ConcealedCarry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is ${modID}:Phased, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:ShuttleKick.NAME: Shuttle Kick
${modID}:ShuttleKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Short *Circuit into your draw pile.

${modID}:EncryptData.NAME: Encrypt Data
${modID}:EncryptData.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand. Gain !B! Block and a *Burnt *Document for each card Exhausted.

${modID}:ClipboardSlap.NAME: Clipboard Slap
${modID}:ClipboardSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust the top card of your discard pile.
${modID}:ClipboardSlap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in your discard pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card in your Discard pile to Exhaust.

${modID}:ServerHash.NAME: Server Hash
${modID}:ServerHash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:Blocc! Block. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Play 1 Attack: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Complete: Draw a card.

${modID}:dummyattack.NAME: Dummy!
${modID}:dummyattack.DESCRIPTION: Does absolutely nothing! NL Classified as an attack.

${modID}:Overpower.NAME: Overpower
${modID}:Overpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Play 1 Power. NL ${modID}:Complete: Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Datamining.NAME: Datamining
${modID}:Datamining.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.

${modID}:TrialRun.NAME: Trial Run
${modID}:TrialRun.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If you have ${modID}:Phased a card this turn, gain [E].

${modID}:CleanUpDuty.NAME: Clean Up Duty
${modID}:CleanUpDuty.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. Add a *Slimed to the top of your draw pile.
${modID}:CleanUpDuty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. Add a *Slimed to the top of your draw pile.

${modID}:Wingbeat.NAME: Wingbeat
${modID}:Wingbeat.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card for every card you Exhausted the previous turn.

${modID}:ShortCircuit.NAME: Short Circuit
${modID}:ShortCircuit.DESCRIPTION: Plays when drawn. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - 1 ${modID}:Progression: Lose [E]. NL ${modID}:Complete: Exhaust.

${modID}:LaserStrike.NAME: Laser Strike
${modID}:LaserStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you ${modID}:Completed an ${modID}:Experiment this turn, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:Analyze.NAME: Analyze
${modID}:Analyze.DESCRIPTION: Permanently increase the number of ${modID}:Trials on this card by 1. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Play 1 Card: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Complete: Exhaust.

${modID}:PlasmicEnergy.NAME: Plasmic Energy
${modID}:PlasmicEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL ${modID}:Etheric !${modID}:eth!. NL Next turn, gain [E]  and draw a card.
${modID}:PlasmicEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Next turn, gain [E]  and draw a card.

${modID}:CutThroughLight.NAME: Cut Through Light
${modID}:CutThroughLight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Start 1 Turn: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:FerrousBlade.NAME: Ferrous Blade
${modID}:FerrousBlade.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Etheric !${modID}:eth!. NL Deal !D! damage. Add a Ferrous Blade into your hand that costs an additional [E]  this turn.
${modID}:FerrousBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Etheric !${modID}:eth!. NL Deal !D! damage. Add a Ferrous Blade+ into your hand that costs an additional [E]  this turn.

${modID}:Overwrite.NAME: Overwrite
${modID}:Overwrite.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose !M! card{!M!|>1=s} in your hand to add ${modID}:Phase to. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RemnantResearch.NAME: Remnant Research
${modID}:RemnantResearch.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 *Burnt *Documents to your hand. At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for each card Exhausted this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Hypothesis.NAME: Hypothesis
${modID}:Hypothesis.DESCRIPTION: The first a card is Exhausted each turn, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Organization.NAME: Organization
${modID}:Organization.DESCRIPTION: Choose an active ${modID}:Experiment to gain "Draw 2 cards" and ${modID}:Complete: Exhaust.
${modID}:Organization.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an active ${modID}:Experiment to gain "Draw 2 cards."

${modID}:AppliedInformation.NAME: Applied Information
${modID}:AppliedInformation.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add a copy into your hand. If it has ${modID}:Phase, Exhaust both copies.
${modID}:AppliedInformation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add a copy into your hand. If it has ${modID}:Phase, Exhaust the copy twice.

${modID}:Dematerialize.NAME: Dematerialize
${modID}:Dematerialize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If there is a Status in your hand, gain [E]  and draw a card.

${modID}:ResearchGrants.NAME: Research Grants
${modID}:ResearchGrants.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E]  every time a card is ${modID}:Phased. Gain !M! ${modID}:Manipulation. Reset this card's cost.

${modID}:Entropy.NAME: Entropy
${modID}:Entropy.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random card into your hand. It gains Ethereal.
${modID}:Entropy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random card into your hand. It gains Ethereal and ${modID}:Phase.

${modID}:Enthalpy.NAME: Enthalpy
${modID}:Enthalpy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand with ${modID}:Phase. NL At the start of your turn, add a copy of that card to your hand with Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have no cards with Phase in my hand.

${modID}:ShieldCrash.NAME: Shield Crash
${modID}:ShieldCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. When this card is Exhausted, add a copy to your hand with swapped damage and Block values.

${modID}:DarkMatterLancet.NAME: Dark Matter Lancet
${modID}:DarkMatterLancet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Voids to your discard pile.

${modID}:PlasmaPulse.NAME: Plasma Pulse
${modID}:PlasmaPulse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Play 1 Attack: Add a *Plasmic *Energy to your hand.

${modID}:Hyperfocus.NAME: Hyperfocus
${modID}:Hyperfocus.DESCRIPTION: Choose an active ${modID}:Experiment. ${modID}:Complete all other ${modID}:Experiments, then add their remaining ${modID}:Trials to that ${modID}:Experiment plus 1.

${modID}:ImpactSlash.NAME: Impact Slash
${modID}:ImpactSlash.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if every other card in your hand is a Status. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have non-Status cards in my hand.

${modID}:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
${modID}:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Start 1 Turn: Apply !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.
${modID}:Exploit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Start 1 Turn: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SubspaceStrike.NAME: Subspace Strike
${modID}:SubspaceStrike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. Increases by !${modID}:Scaling! for each Status in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WaveParticle.NAME: Wave Particle
${modID}:WaveParticle.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Exhaust 1 Status: Add a *Subspace *Strike to your hand.

${modID}:VolcanicResearch.NAME: Volcanic Research
${modID}:VolcanicResearch.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 3 *Magma *Burns into your draw pile. Whenever you draw a Status card, gain !M! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle a *Magma *Burn into your draw pile. Whenever you draw a Status card, gain !M! Strength and draw !M! card.

${modID}:NeutralyzerSerum.NAME: Neutralyzer Serum
${modID}:NeutralyzerSerum.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment X - Play 1 Attack: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.
${modID}:NeutralyzerSerum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment X+1 - Play 1 Attack: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.

${modID}:ParticleAccelerator.NAME: Particle Accelerator
${modID}:ParticleAccelerator.DESCRIPTION: Discard the top !M! cards your draw pile. NL Cards with ${modID}:Phase will have a copy Exhausted.

${modID}:CometStrike.NAME: Comet Strike
${modID}:CometStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add an *Ion *Tail into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CometStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add an *Ion *Tail+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ExtensiveTesting.NAME: Extensive Testing
${modID}:ExtensiveTesting.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play 1 *Field *Test.
${modID}:ExtensiveTesting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play 1 *Field *Test+.

${modID}:ResonantHexagraph.NAME: Resonant Hexagraph
${modID}:ResonantHexagraph.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. Once per turn, add a copy into your hand with 2 less Block until it reaches 0.

${modID}:EclipsedForm.NAME: Eclipsed Form
${modID}:EclipsedForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, draw 3 cards and increase your maximum hand NL size by !M!.
${modID}:EclipsedForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 3 cards and increase your maximum hand NL size by !M!.

${modID}:MagmaBurn.NAME: Magma Burn
${modID}:MagmaBurn.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take !M! damage for each Status in your hand. Exhausts after !stslib:ex! uses.

${modID}:SulfurPod.NAME: Sulfur Pod
${modID}:SulfurPod.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ALL enemies lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust any *Sulfur *Pods in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:dummyethereal.NAME: Etheral Mod
${modID}:dummyethereal.DESCRIPTION: Adds Better Ethereal Mod to all cards in hand.

${modID}:SystemError.NAME: System Error
${modID}:SystemError.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a *Short *Circuit+. Whenever a *Short *Circuit ${modID}:Completes, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity.

${modID}:HadalJetsuit.NAME: Hadal Jetsuit
${modID}:HadalJetsuit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card ${modID}:Phases, gain 2 temporary ${modID}:Manipulation. Every 3 cards ${modID}:Phased, gain !M! Manipulation.

${modID}:SulfuricOxidation.NAME: Sulfuric Oxidation
${modID}:SulfuricOxidation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Sulfur *Pods to your hand.

${modID}:PurgeRecords.NAME: Purge Records
${modID}:PurgeRecords.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When you play a *Burnt *Document this turn, gain !M! Strength.
${modID}:PurgeRecords.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a *Burnt *Document into your hand. When you play a *Burnt *Document this turn, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:TeslaCoil.NAME: Tesla Coil
${modID}:TeslaCoil.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a *Plasmic *Energy+ into your draw pile.
${modID}:TeslaCoil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, add a *Plasmic *Energy+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:LetVandDocumenting.NAME: Let-Vand Documenting
${modID}:LetVandDocumenting.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity for every *Status in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Livewire.NAME: Livewire
${modID}:Livewire.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Play 1 Card: Gain [E] [E] {!Upgrades!|>0=[E] }. Add a *Short *Circuit into your discard pile.

${modID}:HeavyContainment.NAME: Heavy Containment
${modID}:HeavyContainment.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Add a copy of each card Exhausted into your hand that costs [E]  less this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Incinerate.NAME: Incinerate
${modID}:Incinerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust all *Statuses in hand. Draw a card for each Status Exhausted.

${modID}:Multithread.NAME: Multithread
${modID}:Multithread.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Play 1 Skill: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Complete: Add 2 copies of this card into your discard pile with 1 more ${modID}:Trial. Exhaust.

${modID}:FieldTest.NAME: Field Test
${modID}:FieldTest.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - 1 ${modID}:Progression: Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL ${modID}:Complete: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

${modID}:Accelecharger.NAME: Accelecharger
${modID}:Accelecharger.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, choose !M! card in your draw pile to add to your hand. It gains Ethereal.
${modID}:Accelecharger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, choose !M! card in your draw pile to add to your hand. It gains Ethereal.

${modID}:OrbitalStrike.NAME: Orbital Strike
${modID}:OrbitalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Add X *Orbital *Beacons to your discard pile. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies per *Orbital *Beacon after all of them are played. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:OrbitalStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X+1 Orbital Beacons to your discard pile. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies per *Orbital *Beacon after all of them are played. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CommandExecuted.NAME: Command Executed
${modID}:CommandExecuted.DESCRIPTION: Thank you for your input, O5-13. NL Your ascent will continue shortly.

${modID}:OwnTempo.NAME: Own Tempo
${modID}:OwnTempo.DESCRIPTION: Your next ${modID}:Experiment card this turn will play twice.
${modID}:OwnTempo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next two ${modID}:Experiments cards this turn will play twice.

${modID}:ContactLight.NAME: Contact Light
${modID}:ContactLight.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL *Statuses in your draw pile. NL Add a *Plasmic *Energy+ into your discard pile for each card Exhausted.
${modID}:ContactLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL *Statuses in your draw and discard pile. NL Add a *Plasmic *Energy+ into your discard pile for each card Exhausted.

${modID}:BorealisProtocol.NAME: Borealis Protocol
${modID}:BorealisProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, lose [E] [E]. At the start of your turn, ${modID}:Phase all non-Power cards in your hand with ${modID}:Phase !M! time.
${modID}:BorealisProtocol.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, lose [E]. At the start of your turn, ${modID}:Phase all non-Power cards in your hand with ${modID}:Phase !M! time.

${modID}:Finalize.NAME: Finalize
${modID}:Finalize.DESCRIPTION: Choose an active ${modID}:Experiment. ${modID}:Progress it until it ${modID}:Completes. Gain [E]  for each ${modID}:Progression. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Finalize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an active ${modID}:Experiment. ${modID}:Progress it until it ${modID}:Completes. Gain [E]  and draw a card for each ${modID}:Progression. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:IonSurge.NAME: Ion Surge
${modID}:IonSurge.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Every 3 times you ${modID}:Progress an ${modID}:Experiment, gain !M! Strength, Dexterity, or Artifact randomly.
${modID}:IonSurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every 3 times you ${modID}:Progress an ${modID}:Experiment, gain !M! Strength, Dexterity, or Artifact randomly.

${modID}:CatalyticAfterburner.NAME: Catalytic Afterburner
${modID}:CatalyticAfterburner.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each *Plasmic *Energy Exhausted this combat.

${modID}:AltercatedBlueprint.NAME: Altercated Blueprint
${modID}:AltercatedBlueprint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary ${modID}:Manipulation. NL ${modID}:Phase the last card ${modID}:Phased this combat.

${modID}:DataRequest.NAME: Data Request
${modID}:DataRequest.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Play 1 Power: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Complete: Exhaust.

${modID}:BlackBox.NAME: Black Box
${modID}:BlackBox.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${modID}:Phase a card, gain !M! ${modID}:Metallicize. NL At the start of your turn, lose half of your ${modID}:Metallicize.

${modID}:Centrifuge.NAME: Centrifuge
${modID}:Centrifuge.DESCRIPTION: Select exactly 5 cards with unique card types in your hand. Create ${modID}:Experiments with !M! ${modID}:Trials of those cards with "Play 1 Type" as their condition. They have ${modID}:Complete: Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have not met the conditions to play this card.

${modID}:DataOverride.NAME: Data Override
${modID}:DataOverride.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Play 1 Power: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Complete: Play a Data Override. Exhaust.

${modID}:Singularity.NAME: Singularity
${modID}:Singularity.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Play 1 Card: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Complete: Play a *Singularity with 1 less Block and ${modID}:Trial until it reaches 0. Exhaust.

${modID}:ElectromagneticInstability.NAME: Electromagnetic Instability
${modID}:ElectromagneticInstability.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Cannot be removed from your deck. When entering your hand, gain 1 ${modID}:Instability.
